summary: DOD is working to develop AI capabilities—computer systems capable of tasks that normally require human intelligence. We found that DOD's efforts to acquire AI come with some challenges that DOD usually faces, such as DOD's long acquisition processes and shortages of skilled staff, as well as AI-specific challenges like having enough usable data to train the AI. For example, AI for detecting an adversary's submarines...
title: Artificial Intelligence: Status of Developing and Acquiring Capabilities for Weapon Systems
